DESSERT & DRINKS

AWAKEN YOUR TASTEBUDS AND ENJOY THE
FINEST QUALITY PRODUCE, PREPARATE BY
OUR INSPIRED TEAM AT MELROSE.

Enjoy the open, light filled dining atmosphere overlooking the
Shevchenko Park and Monastery Island. The Melrose menus
incorporate each season's specialties and our Head Chef’s
recent creations can be found in the current menus below.
If you prefer the convenience of in-room dining
there is a room service menu available.

CLICK TO DOWNLOAD OUR MENUS

MAKE A BOOKING

1800 088 388
